New Records: Colombia extended their unbeaten streak to 27 straight matches without a defeat.
Key Match Events: Jhon Cordoba scored in the 8th minute
James Rodriguez scored from the penalty spot in the 15th minute
Luis Diaz added a third goal just before halftime
Richard Rios scored a long-range effort in the 71st minute
Miguel Borja scored a goal from the penalty spot in the 92nd minute
Post-Match Reflections: James Rodriguez was praised for his performance, including four assists and a goal, and is in contention for MVP of the tournament.
Panama's defense was criticized for conceding twice in the opening 15 minutes.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Colombia will advance to play the winner of Brazil-Uruguay in the semifinals of the tournament.
The victor of that match will then compete against the winner of Argentina-Canada in the Copa America final.
